alert.note: Alert for Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 5:03AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton affecting Whitfield County. For the Conasauga River Basin...including Keiths Mill near Dalton... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, Minor flooding expands into the pastures... fields and woodlands upstream and downstream from the Keiths Mill Road bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 16.7 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.6 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 16 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
